definition[0]: to send something somewhere by post
example[0]: I sent off the letter this morning.
definition[1]: to send a letter to a company or organization asking them to post something to you
example[1]: I sent off for a copy of the photograph.
definition[2]: to order a sports player to leave the field because they have broken the rules
example[2]: One of Dundee’s players was sent off for punching another player.
definition[3]: a party or other occasion when people meet to say goodbye to someone who is leaving
example[3]: The department gave Tom a send-off he won’t forget!
